title: Lions, Tigers, and Bears, & Brown Diamonds, Exposed Text Messages and DMs
description:
Ocean saw Santa and snow for the first time! And Lala’s telling the incredible, almost unbelievable, true story about her engagement ring, and sharing her reaction to “he who shall not be named’s” exposed text messages and DMs. Then she welcomes Bobbi Brink, the founder and owner of “Lions, Tigers and Bears: A Big Cat & Exotic Animal Rescue” in Alpine, California (lionstigersandbears.org) to discover how Bobbi became involved in big cat rescue and what we all can do to help the animals, and stop the practice of “cub petting!” Plus, some lessons from this podcast – the universe reveals everyone’s truths and you can only live a certain life for so long! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
